      • calculPointIntersection

        public Vector3D calculPointIntersection​(Ray r)
        Find the point intersection with the triangle and the ray r
        Parameters:
        r - ray shoot from the camera
        Returns:
        point of intersection between the ray and the triangle (the point may be incorrect)
